description: Schema for value lists used in UI selectors and filters. Returns a standardized list of value/label pairs suitable for dropdowns, multi-selects, checkboxes, and autocomplete components. Each item has a required value field (the actual data value) and optional label (display text), description (tooltip), and metadata (additional context).

value.description: Array of value/label pairs following OData format. Each item represents a selectable option for UI controls.
The actual value that will be submitted when selected. Can be string, number, integer, boolean, or null.

label.description: Human-readable label displayed to users. If omitted, value will be displayed directly.

description.description: Optional detailed description shown in tooltips or help text to explain what this value represents.

metadata.description: Additional context data like icons, colors, badges, or custom properties used by specific UI components.
